casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Eric Scott TURNER No. 457P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 20, 2017 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Turner, Eric Scott. James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill. Melissa H. Taylor, Assistant Attorney General, Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th of December 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
